column1: Glad to see career scientists at @EPA stand up for science and block @EPAAWheeler’s last-ditch attempt to harm our environment and public health in favor of polluters.  The incoming Biden Admin will restore scientific integrity at the EPA. https://t.co/U5jgJi9UMP

Another parting “gift” from Trump. This time it's holding developers harmless for the "incidental" killing of migratory birds. This is exactly why I’m a cosponsor of the Migratory Bird Protection Act to restore the landmark Migratory Bird Treaty Act. https://t.co/dwwc94t8Z4
It will be no easy task but President-elect Biden will restore DACA rebuild our nation’s asylum system and reverse course on Trump’s heartless immigration policies.  https://t.co/3Ta1uvOuTy
As this economic crisis continues our small businesses need the support of our local communities. Remember to shop small safe and local on this #SmallBusinessSaturday.  https://t.co/qzpJEzr75c
Trump should do our democracy a favor and just admit that he lost the election.   This absurd game must end. https://t.co/YBCoI10pNw

Science should drive our response to the #COVID19 pandemic - not politics. I welcome President-elect Biden’s pledge to re-join the @WHO because we must work with the global scientific community to fight this pandemic. https://t.co/fGXSTAbTyO
During these uncertain times one thing you can count on is affordable reliable health care coverage available NOW until January 31st at https://t.co/3K1H0CI435. #GetCoveredNJ https://t.co/BzHJRz6cwY

On #NativeAmericanHeritageDay we honor our indigenous communities and their contributions to our country. As Chairman of @EnergyCommerce I’m working to make sure that our nation’s tribal communities have access to health care safe drinking water and broadband.

.@Pontifex reminds us in the midst of the coronavirus pandemic we must work together to defeat #COVID19.   Governments have a responsibility to use science to guide us and to care for the well-being and health of others above all else. https://t.co/y49UdadFjD

Our bill also improves the Strategic National Stockpile by producing PPE at home in America so that our health workers aren't forced to reuse N95 masks or make their own protective gowns. We have the means and solutions to do better.

In addition the GOP Senate must pass the #HeroesAct which provides over $400 billion in assistance to state and local governments who desperately need funds to pay vital workers like first responders and health workers who keep us safe.

Glad @JohnKerry will take a leading role in the Biden Admin's efforts to address the #ClimateCrisis. His decades of expertise particularly in the international cooperation space is sorely needed. This move adds to our hope that the US will once again tackle the crisis head-on.
